remarks: Lemma for ~ dihprrn , showing one of 4 cases.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dihprrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihprrn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihprrn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihprrn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dihprrn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihprrn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihprrn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dihprrn.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
dihprrnlem1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihprrnlem1.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dihprrnlem1.nz $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= .0. ) $.
dihprrnlem1.x $e |- ( ph -> ( `' I ` ( N ` { X } ) ) .<_ W ) $.
dihprrnlem1.y $e |- ( ph -> -. ( `' I ` ( N ` { Y } ) ) .<_ W ) $.
dihprrnlem1N $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) e. ran I ) $.
